branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Linear Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>The rodless cylinder with a linear guide type are ideal for pick and place applications.  This uses a linear guide to achieve high repeatability.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Linear Guide

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1H-A*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/ Stroke Adjuster - Linear Guide
branchItem.description: <p>Rodless Cylinders, MY1H-A*Z and MY1H-S*Z include a high precision guide that improves positioning accuracy.  They have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1H-*Z, Mechanically Jointed Low/High Load Shock Absorber - Linear Guide
branchItem.description: <p>Rodless Cylinders, MY1H-L*Z and MY1H-H*Z has an integrated linear guide that improves positioning accuracy. Mechanical joint has a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. </p>
